summary: The implementation covers most requirements with a solid foundation. The backend data model (REQ-1) is implemented with data sources, bot configs, and queries. Backend query functions (REQ-2) are structurally present but lack actual data processing logic. The frontend includes a dashboard with visualizations (REQ-3), a chat interface (REQ-4), and data upload functionality (REQ-5). The visual theme (REQ-6) uses the specified color palette. However, some acceptance criteria are partially met: backend query processing generates mock/random data rather than real pattern analysis, data validation on upload is minimal, and bot responses are simulated rather than data-driven.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend can execute data queries and bot generates responses based on data patterns
missing_requirements.reason: Backend stores query text and results as static strings but does not implement actual query execution logic or pattern-based response generation. Frontend simulates bot responses with setTimeout rather than calling backend query processing functions.

missing_requirements.requirement: Data validation is performed on upload
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend validates file type and size but backend does not perform any data validation on received data URLs. No schema validation or data integrity checks are implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Bot can access and analyze imported data
missing_requirements.reason: Backend stores data URLs but provides no functions to parse, analyze, or extract insights from the uploaded data files. No data parsing or analysis logic exists.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication system with login/logout functionality
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention authentication, identity management, or user login requirements, yet the implementation includes full II integration with AuthClient, identity providers, and authentication state management.
Backend imports and includes blob-storage mixins (MixinStorage, Storage) which are not requested in the BuildRequest. No file storage or blob management was specified as a requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Mock trend metrics and percentage indicators
hallucinated_features.reason: Dashboard displays trend percentages (+12%, +8%, etc.) that are hardcoded, not derived from actual data analysis. This creates misleading business intelligence indicators not requested.
